title: January 2026 General Meeting
content:
## Attendance

Present: 18 parents, Principal Smith, Vice-Principal Jones

## Agenda Items

### 1. Treasurer's Report
- Current balance: $4,250
- Hot lunch program revenue: $1,200
- Outstanding expenses: $350 for winter event supplies

### 2. Fundraising Update
- Spring Gala planning committee formed
- Venue booked for April 20
- Volunteer sign-up sheet circulated

### 3. Playground Renovation
- Quotes received from 3 contractors
- Target budget: $15,000
- District matching grant application submitted

### 4. Next Meeting
- February 12, 2026 at 7:00 PM in the School Library

Minutes submitted by: Secretary Jane Doe

title: February 2026 General Meeting
content:
## Attendance

Present: 22 parents, Principal Smith

## Agenda Items

### 1. Treasurer's Report
- Current balance: $4,800
- Approved $500 for classroom supplies request

### 2. Spring Gala Update
- Silent auction items being collected
- Ticket price set at $40 per person
- Entertainment committee confirmed live music

### 3. School Safety Discussion
- Review of pick-up/drop-off procedures
- New crosswalk guard schedule approved

### 4. Next Meeting
- March 5, 2026 at 7:00 PM in the School Library

Minutes submitted by: Secretary Jane Doe
